t: ISO 9001 Certification & Amazon Distribution Center Suppliers | Learn About ISO 9001 & Requirements for Amazon | Smithers
s: Amazon requires its distribution center suppliers to adopt a quality management system. Adhering to ISO 9001 requirements is one way to adopt a QMS. Learn how Smithers and ISO 9001 certification can help your company meet Amazon's request.

t: Should Amazon Suppliers Get ISO 9001 Certified? - Smithers
s: Smithers can help you meet Amazon's supply chain standards by becoming ISO 9001 certified. An ISO 9001 certification covers Amazon’s supply chain requirements and, in fact, goes beyond them in many cases. Learn more about ISO 9001 compliance as an Amazon Supplier today.
